title: Honey
description: Honey wishes she could have a pretty home and a mother who really cares about her. Ever since her father left them, Honey has been taking care of everything. She wishes someone would worry about her for a change. If only she had a friend she could talk to…Why does she feel so guilty about her mother? And why is she so mean to Danny when she knows how much he loves her? Suddenly Honey’s world is coming apart – her father is coming back to live with them! Can she ever forgive him?
author: Helen Cavanagh
